an1.21-30:4.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed like this, is as useless as the mind.
an1.21-30:7.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed like this, is as workable as the mind.
an1.21-30:10.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed like this, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.21-30:10.2: An undeveloped mind is very harmful.”
an1.21-30:13.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed like this, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.21-30:13.2: A developed mind is very beneficial.”
an1.21-30:16.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed like this, with such untapped potential, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.21-30:16.2: An undeveloped mind, with untapped potential, is very harmful.”
an1.21-30:19.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed like this, with its potential realized, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.21-30:19.2: A developed mind, with its potential realized, is very beneficial.”
an1.21-30:22.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated like this, is so very harmful as the mind.
an1.21-30:22.2: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind is very harmful.”
an1.21-30:25.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed and cultivated like this, is so very beneficial as the mind.
an1.21-30:25.2: A developed and cultivated mind is very beneficial.”
an1.21-30:28.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not developed and cultivated like this, brings such suffering as the mind.
an1.21-30:28.2: An undeveloped and uncultivated mind brings suffering.”
an1.21-30:31.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is developed and cultivated like this, brings such happiness as the mind.
an1.21-30:31.2: A developed and cultivated mind brings happiness.”
